column1: Little Goat Diner////My gf and I stopped down to this west loop treasure for a late brunch. We waited about 45 minutes around 2:00pm this past Saturday and found the wait to be well worth it. The service was great and we shared the reuben (which was one of
column2: if not the best one I have ever had) the tempura mashed potatoes (awesome) and the highlight
column4: the bulls-eye french toast... price was much less expensive for the amount of food we ate (in addition to the yummy drinks we ordered) and is a place I will be going to often.
